reviewText: Excellent, really interesting documentary on the history of the Chuck Wagon Gang, with a number of their songs included along the way.  If you enjoy the music of the Chuck Wagon Gang, you'll definitely want to see this.
Mother in law loved this for mother's day!

This dvd is not about their legacy, but is mostly about Marty Stuart writing some very poor songs for their new album.  Very few clips of the original group and the ones that followed them.  If you are a die-hard fan of the Chuck Wagon Gang, this is not for you.
It was a very well done review of their legacy plus their new songs.
